website_summaries.verdict: A unique budget hair dryer that emphasizes hair styling more than drying.
pros: Comes in the shape of a standard large hair brush and is used in the same manner
Uses a built-in heating element to slowly dry hair without damaging individual hair strands or the scalp
Detangling bristles gently glide through hair
cons: Takes longer to dry hair than traditional hair dryers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: I’m 50 years old and have shoulder length weird (not in a good way) hair, and this brush makes it look less weird. Let me explain. My hair is mostly fine, straight, silky, and shiny, except where it’s wavy, coarse, damaged, and grey. I used to use a flat iron to smooth out the crown, but it left my hair limp and lifeless. This brush gives my hair the smoothness I’m looking for, but also body and bounce. It’s not stick straight, but it also doesn’t look like anchor woman hair. It’s easy to use, all you do is brush your hair. Just make sure your hair is completely dry, and don’t forget to use a heat protectant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be honest, I thought for sure I would be sending this back. I actually love it. My hair was straitened in less then 10 min! Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I have frizzy curly hair medium length hair and it takes forever to straighten my hair with a flat iron(about 1 hr). I was skeptical whether or not this would work but it DOES! It's not as flat/frizz-free as a flat iron but it's comparable. Plus! It cut the time in half if not more and my hair doesn't feel as fried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my MIL who wanted something to style her hair but didn’t want it to be heavy, difficult, or take too long. Saw the good reviews and liked the price so figured I’d try it. It has a great digital display that says OFF anytime it’s plugged in and then you just press ON and the + or - for the temperature. She’s growing out a perm and it glides through her hair once easily and was almost blowout straight. She’s never styled her hair and she figured this out in a few minutes. So it’s great for anyone who is new to hair tools. And she also said it didn’t get too hot on her scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for medium/shoulder length hair
customer_reviews.text: This styling brush helps get out all of the creases in my straight/wavy hair. I keep it on the lowest setting to prevent hair damage. I use this every morning and within 5 minutes, my hair looks sleek and tidy! After one month, my hair has no damage. Best product ever made! I'm still trying to figure out best way to clean in between the bristles but it's not a big deal. Be sure to unplug the brush after each use because even though the brush says OFF, the light stays on and now the temperature numbers are a little hard to read. Good thing the default is set to the lowest temp. Still a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Erika D.

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this brush. I have thick, coarse curly hair and this brush works well. It is much faster than using a flattening iron and I don't feel it is as harsh on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Polky

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: It really straightens my short thin hair very nicely. I also like that it does so on a low (250 degree) setting to protect my hair from damage at higher levels. Very satisfied and I bought one for my daughter in law too. She has longer, thicker hair but it works well for her too.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but makes ends look terrible
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the smoothing of a more expensive brand, this makes your ends look like they are split. I advise that you actually roll them under if you want a true blowout, so many sure you're using heat protectant on top of and under your hair. That being said, this is a really good value for those of us that don't buy expensive blowdryers/etc on principle. It gets hair looking smoother and straighter in less than 5 minutes. Play with your heat settings before making a judgment. I found I needed a hotter setting for the product to work well.
customer_reviews.author: CATeaching

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quickly and much easier than a flat iron
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this brush! I had a Brazilian blowout for my thick, coarse, frizzy curls and needed something to straighten it daily. I looked up many others and this one just had the reviews along with a good price. This brush heats up sooo quickly and goes through my hair with ease. Cuts time by far compared to flat iron and looks just as great. My only complaint is that it’s hard to clean but overall I’m very happy with my purchase and can’t believe it didn’t buy it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Tom  and Liz K.

customer_reviews.title: Best used for touch ups
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I have very curly hair and use for "day after" touch ups or for smoothing after blow drying. Not really the tool to straighten curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Marijean Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: I love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: This brush works great. It heats up fast. I use it more than my flat iron. The only thing that prevented me from giving it 5 stars is that you have to be careful not to shut off the brush while using it. The buttons are on the handle. It’s very easy to press the off button while using it. You have to hold it a certain way to prevent this from happening.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Krewer Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have medium length hair that is very curly - like a 80s rockstar. Usually it takes me about 25-30 min to straighten it in the morning...this takes me NINE minutes! Nine! So far I love it. I cant believe I didnt buy one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Siegel-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Super easy, works super well!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this brush. I have long (nearly waist length) hair that tends to frizz in the Florida heat and humidity, and has sections that are wavier than others. A nice brush through my hair gets it straight, frizz free, and doesn't leave any obvious marks that straightening rods sometimes do. I love the variety of heat levels, and that it just takes one 'pass' to get my desired look achieved. Fast, effective. LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: NCarp

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought in June 2019 and literally used it twice and now it's not turning on at all. I've tried different outlets just to make sure it's my outlets issues. Will be contacting products customer service.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Visible static
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I feel about this product. I did like it initially and how it has staggered bristles to get each strand equally heated. However. After my 2-3rd week. It's been making loud electric noises. At the bottom of the bristles is a pink part that has holes and I can see constant electric statics. And I'm too nervous it'll catch my hair so I havent touched it. Thought of buy another but I don't want to wait too long to where I can't return. So, I'm currently out of luck with. I did like it at first, but the noise and visible currents really, really deters me.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Plesantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I have thick wavy hair that takes about 20 minutes to straighten with a hot iron. I was able to do it in half the time with the brush. Various articles I read said that you don't need to section your hair as it is a brush. You still need to section though. Instead of starting underneath like I do with the iron, I just sectioned my hair in smaller pieces and combed through normally. I started underneath and finished on top. I am pleased with how straight it got, almost no wave is visible. I can't say that with the hot iron. I recommend Googling videos on how others used it. This helped me a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Teach1

customer_reviews.title: If you have fine hair this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: This straightening brush is the absolute best! I own some very high end hot tools but this thing is by far and above the very best! I have fine, thick hair that is curly when short and wavy when long. The teeth in this brush are very close together making it perfect for fine hair. the length of the brush is long and perfect meaning you can brush large sections of hair at once and get it done faster. It fits nicely in my tiny hand and the weight is nicely balanced making it very comfortable to use. My hair was done in record time and very very soft. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This couldn't be more simple to use and you can get really close to the scalp with this brush without worrying about burning your skin. And the fact that you can set the temperature to your liking, rather than having a simple low/high setting is fantastic. My hairstylist told me most tools run way too hot, which causes damage, and that the lowest setting that will accomplish what you desire is always best for the health of your hair. This one goes as low as 290 degrees, which is the setting I use, even though I have very thick and medium (coarseness) hair. Wish all hair tools offered variable temp settings!
customer_reviews.author: wanttohelp

customer_reviews.title: Got only one use....
customer_reviews.text: One use is all I got. The on off button is in a spot that you easily hit while using this product. I’m so disappointed. It did a great job on my hair, and I’ve had great success with other Revlon hair tools, but it will not turn on again. LCD screen blank after one use. I was actually in the middle of doing my hair when I accidentally turned it off, and would not turn back on. Requested a return with no replacement, just a refund. I will have to search harder for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Time saving "blow-dryer" / iron
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for months. It makes drying my hair a snap. I have mixed hair so let my hair air dry, "blow dry" my hair with this and then Wam Bam it with a flat iron. I give this 5 stars because I use it in place of a blow dryer - and to fix any frizzyness after the initial first say of flat ironing my hair. *I would not use this in replace of my flat iron. My hair would be left frizzy in this Florida weather.
customer_reviews.author: Naomie

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL. BROKE WITH BARELY 3 USES. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT. The first time I used it, the screen and buttons were great but the power button needed to be pressed like 10 times just to be turned on. It makes a really loud ticking noise while it’s heating up, which is fine but then it also produces a burning smell. By the third use, the LED screen that displayed temperature stopped working and it made a pop sound and produced so much smoke that I was actually scared that it would catch on fire. Useless, I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Avnesha G.

customer_reviews.title: For men too! (Beards)
customer_reviews.text: This is a superior to the offering that are out there for men's beards. (Takes 5 minutes). I suggest you get some protective heat spray to make sure not to damage your beard. Wife loves it too to straighten her hair in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! However not for African American hair, it will straighten but not like a silk press and it also doesn’t reach roots, I will add though that it’s very good for weaves and wigs which is what I use it for! It’s very easy to hold it’s just like a brush with little to no tugging it glides through hair very smoothly, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Hollowell

customer_reviews.title: Great as a complement to blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: I have very frizzy hair and I don’t have too much patience for a good blow dry. This really helps taming my hair , without being as harsh as a standard straightener.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Great for touch ups!

Its like a flat iron with a brush. I have not used it for a full wash/flat iron but I imagine it would be something you use with a flat iron. It's a good product but it doesn't replace a good quality flat iron.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N. Loutchaninoff

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as others
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't straighten as well as other brands and leaves my hair frizzy. I prefer my uspicy brush.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Straightens my frizz out.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really "dry" hair for me, but does tame my natural curly, frizzy hair. Love this because it has smaller teeth, than the first one I bought that is similar. Smaller teeth make it easier to style, and smooth my long hair, and make it behave without a lot of work. Easy to hold and use.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Small sections at a time
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for those that don't like putting a lot of heat to their hair. It doesn't get to the roots because it's a "brush style tool". Also, straightening small sections at a time will give you the best results. Make sure you've detangled each section to prevent snags as you brush through. I straightened my natural hair after a year and it did a great job. It was not "flat iron straight", but it enabled me to clip my ends and to see the growth in length of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Does what is says
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, this is great for touch ups and second day hair. I did try it instead of my flat iron after a blowout and it just didn’t work for me as well as the flat iron, but I have very coarse hair (3c/4a curls which currently have a keratin treatment). It is a great tool for saving time on subsequent days.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality good price

customer_reviews.author: CLB

customer_reviews.title: Average functional hair straightening device

customer_reviews.author: sai charan

customer_reviews.title: Best hair product purchased ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have permed thick hair. Every straightener I have tried takes at least 3 passes on my hair to get it close to straight. Tried a no-name brand straightening brush. Didn't work. This. Worked with one pass everywhere. And then another for touchups! My hair doesn't feel fried. And this heated up in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Lessard

customer_reviews.title: easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Works well on long hair, not so much on short
customer_reviews.text: Giving 4 stars because it works really well for my daughter’s long hair but not so well for me and my other daughter who have short, curly hair. Still counting it a success!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Long Hair

customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t straighten
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this brush would straighten my hair at all. I do have very thick hair, but I was hoping it would work for touch ups in between.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Miller

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I have really thick wavy hair that until now has been impossible to straighten. If this tech existed when I was a middle schooler it would've been a game changer. It heats up really quickly and only takes a few passes to straighten, usually about a 10 minute process. The handle can be a little awkward & its easy to accidentally turn the brush off, but you can hear when this happens & turn it back on with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use this every day!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for me. I'm not a morning person so I give myself zero time to do my hair. My hair is long and thick and I just heat this up while I do my makeup then run this through my hair for a few minutes and it looks great. It doesn't flatten it the way a hair straightener does so it still has volume, it just takes out all the weird waves that my hair gets.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Nice....but
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, but I keep pushing the off button by mistake. Revlon should rethink the place where the buttons are located. I also wish it was a bit more rounded for curling.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof3

customer_reviews.title: Can’t say enough positive things about it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it for the drying power so I didn’t rate that part. This straightener is a must have! I have super thick hair and often can’t use straighteners like this one, but this one has changed my life. It has different degree settings allowing for me to be able to get through my thick hair! The time to straighten my hair has now been cut in half! Everyone needs one!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is just the hair straightener version so no drying ability. I’ve been straightening my long hair for years and this brush makes the job much easier. Loved it and bought one for my sister
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for course hair
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My hair is very thick and heat resistant. This brush leaves my hair silky/straight after only a few passes. I also like the slimmer design. I thought it advertised a heat glove.
customer_reviews.author: Claudette G.

customer_reviews.title: The Item Dont Work

customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to a traditional flat iron however, I think flat irons have the capability to making hair stick straight whereas this makes your hair smoothe.

customer_reviews.title: hair straightner
customer_reviews.text: I've tried to find a brush straightener that would grab the hair while using the brush. This is exactly what I have been looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it’s easy to use. Straightens my hair no problems whatsoever. Heavy duty with a protective coating to prevent damaging hair.

customer_reviews.title: Great smoothing brush

customer_reviews.title: Works great

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper 59

customer_reviews.author: Ellen Munro

customer_reviews.title: You need this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Where. Has. This. Been. My. Entire. Life???? I am so happy with this purchase. I can get my hair styled in 10 minutes and I’m out the door. The very first day I used it I had compliments on how pretty my hair was. I am extremely happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nate Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for my hair
customer_reviews.text: This works incredibly well. I don't have the patience to make my hair stick straight with it, but it tames all my curls and waves! Easy to use, makes my hair soft and manageable, heats up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Does the job..

customer_reviews.author: Aqsa Nazir

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR THICK CURLY HAIR
customer_reviews.text: If your hair is already straight or close to straight this can be used for touch ups. Not so great for thick curly or wavy hair
customer_reviews.author: Lavanya M.

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: This straightener worked great for just about a week. The power quickly declined and the bristles easily broke off. I stopped using it within a month or so and went back to a traditional flat iron.

customer_reviews.text: Didn’t do much for my medium thickness wavy natural hair or my extensions. I returned and bought the round brush/blow dryer from Revlon.

customer_reviews.title: Best Heated Brush
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!! It’s so easy to use and the bristles do a really good job detangling my hair while the straightening it. I’ve tried other heated brushes but they don’t work as good as this one!! I would totally recommend this product!!

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Works ok at first but doesn't clean very well. Overall, it's not the best for someone with thick course hair like myself. It's fine for after a perm to keep up the straight hair for a few weeks but that's it.

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loves it!

product_meta.title: Revlon XL Hair Straightening Heated Styling Brush
product_meta.description:
Revlon Hair Tools is dedicated to helping women achieve beautiful hair they'll love! Whether women desire gorgeous blowouts, big enviable waves, striking straight locks, or the perfect fashion accessory to complete the look, Revlon has the styling tools you desire. Our innovative Pro Collection line will provide you with the latest technology to help you achieve desired results fast! 


ABOUT THE PRODUCT: Quickly glide your way to smooth, beautifully shiny hair styles. The expertly designed heated brush features an extra-long, ceramic-coated surface with a multi-dimensional combs and detangling bristles that gently glide through hair and get close to the roots, protecting hair from over-styling and locking in moisture, delivering silky smooth results. The superior ION GENERATOR delivers a constant stream of ions to provide maximum frizz control, brilliant shine and manageability. Brush your way to smooth straight results in just one easy step. This dual-voltage, lightweight heated straightening brush will help you achieve your desired look anywhere you go.
feature_bullets: Hair Straightener Brush with Unique XL Heated Brush Head Design for Root to Tip Contact and faster styling
Ceramic Hair Straightening Brush with Plates and Duo Detangling Bristles for Snag Free Styling
10 Variable LCD High Heat Settings up to 430 F for Complete Styling Control
Dual Voltage for Use Anywhere in the World
Lightweight Design is Ergonomically Balanced for Ease of Use
